title: Ask about furnished options, Gameroom with pool tables
posting_body: ['TriVista on Speer', '1350 Speer Blvd , Denver, CO, 80204', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 19', 'OR Text', '19', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'A FRESH OUTLOOK ON URBAN LIVING', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 772 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Introducing TriVista on Speer, offering luxury studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartments anchored in downtown Denver’s coolest corner: The Golden Triangle Creative District.', 'Walk to the city’s best artistic, historical, and outdoor attractions.', 'Enjoy unparalleled amenities.', 'Take in the breathtaking mountain views.', 'TriVista truly satisfies your need for beauty, adventure, and escape.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'QrCnqrjMuP4']
